question: Determine the length of Line_F_M_0 in the figure.
qt_description: Line Line_F_M_0 (Description: Connect vertex F with midpoint M_0 (of line L7))
description:
原始图形描述: Base shape is a complete circle (center O1, init point circle_1) with radius 5. Total 2 derivation rounds. Round 1: applying 'concentric' rule. Concentric derivation: circle (center O1) scaled by 2 (new radius 10). Round 2: applying 'circum_inscribe' rule. Circumscribed 3-sided polygon (center O1) around circle. Found 8 total points (including intersections). Geometry finalized: 6 new lines and 7 new arcs generated by splitting. Total lines: 9, total arcs: 9, total points: 8.
增强操作总轮数: 1
第 1 轮操作（共 1 步）:
  第 1 步: Connect vertex F with midpoint M_0 (of line L7)
api_results:
In the given geometric construction, a circle centered at O1 with radius 5 is first scaled concentrically by a factor of 2 to form a larger circle of radius 10. A triangle ABC is then circumscribed about the smaller circle, with vertices A, B, and C lying on the larger circle. Points D, E, and F are the points of tangency of the triangle with the smaller circle, where D lies on AB, E on BC, and F on AC. Point M_0 is the midpoint of segment AC (line L7). A line segment is drawn connecting point F to point M_0.

Determine the length of segment FM₀.
